Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0000>How many would you like to sell?
talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:TalkPositive>Oh dear, I shouldn't have said that...<sp:5:0:0>
Anyway, is there anything else you need?
talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I was really surprised when all of those
strange monsters swarmed the oasis...

But thanks to the effort and guidance
of the guards, my shop and everyone in it
made it through without a scratch.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I hear you were a big help too!


You must be tired. The <clr:0000>front desk for the
inn<clr:ffff> is in the back, so you should go and
rest. You've earned it!
Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh, er... We don't deal in that here.
talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:CustomVasaaq_00>Vasaaq! The sand shroud might be gone,
but that doesn't mean the monsters are.

The first step of any journey is ample
preparation, so buy until you drop!

If you need to recover from your shopping
spree, the <clr:0000>front desk for the inn<clr:ffff> is
conveniently located at that back counter.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>If you want to sell that, I'm afraid you'll
have to take it off first.
GreetingBefore03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomVasaaq_00>Vasaaq!<sp:5:0:0> This desert is a dangerous place.
My products make it less so!
talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm very sorry.


I've told her a million times not to read
when we have customers.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Before we switched jobs, I used to have
her working this general store, but, well...

She's a little...hm. How do I put this?<sp:5:1:0>
Quiet?<sp:5:1:0> Unsociable?

Customers are rare enough as it is.
We don't need her attitude driving
them away.
talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>The counter back there is the front desk.


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Oh dear... She's back to her book again.
talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>I personally think customers should be
welcomed with a smile when they walk in,
so I'm filling the role of greeter now.
talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>That said, I hear we have a customer
who's come back to stay at the inn
multiple times.
I think she might be drawing in customers
simply by being herself. Maybe that's
charming in its own way.
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Looks like you don't have enough rupees.
Why not sell something you don't need?
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Looks like your inventory is full... Why not
sell something you don't need?
GreetingAfter03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomVasaaq_00>Vasaaq!


Now that the sand shroud has lifted, the
weather's perfect for some exploring! How
about something to keep yourself safe?
talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:CustomVasaaq_00>Vasaaq! A journey through the desert is
dangerous, and a fully stocked pouch is
the best defense!
By the way, the counter in the back is the
<clr:0000>front desk for the inn<clr:ffff>â€”just in case you
want to rest up before your travels.
talk1005: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Oooh! You have something to sell me?
talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Journeying through the desert is rough!
If you don't prepare right, you could try a
hundred times and never make it through.
The counter in the back is the <clr:0000>front desk
for the inn<clr:ffff>, so you can rest up before your
travels, if you like.
talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I like the way you shop! I can't say
sarqso enough.

I'll be closing up shop until my next
shipment of stock arrives.

But the <clr:0000>front desk for the inn<clr:ffff> will still
be open, so feel free to stay with us
if you like.
talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Sorry, it's pretty far back there, so it's
kind of hard to see.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Sarqso for your business! Why not stop by
the inn while you're here?
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Sarqso for your business! I hope to see
you back once I've restocked!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What are you trying to pull?! Get out of
here, now! I'll call the guards!
AssassinClothes: I have nothing to sell you.
talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>This oasis is safe because of the guards,
but be careful if you leave it, OK?
